Package io.servicetalk.transport.netty.internal

Class SequentialTaskQueue<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.servicetalk.transport.netty.internal.SequentialTaskQueue<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of tasks executed by this queue.
    public abstract class SequentialTaskQueue<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A task queue that executes asynchronous tasks sequentially. Since the tasks executed by this queue are potentially asynchronous, it is required for the tasks to call postTaskTermination() after they are done either successfully or with a failure.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected abstract void execute​(T toExecute)
      Executes the passed task and call postTaskTermination() when the task has finished execution, synchronously or asynchronously.
      boolean offerAndTryExecute​(T task)
      Adds the passed task to this queue and triggers execution if there is no task currently executing.
      void postTaskTermination()
      Callback to inform this queue that one of the task executed by this queue has terminated either successfully or with a failure.

    • Method Detail

      • offerAndTryExecute

        public boolean offerAndTryExecute​(T task)
        Adds the passed task to this queue and triggers execution if there is no task currently executing.
        Parameters:
        task - to execute.
        Returns:
        true if the task was successfully added to this queue.

      • postTaskTermination

        public final void postTaskTermination()
        Callback to inform this queue that one of the task executed by this queue has terminated either successfully or with a failure.
